review: I am Andy and I find this place to be a little drab. Not displeasing in any way, but not all that exciting. If you like this place, you too might be a little drab
Hi fans, this is Theo and I LOVE LOVE LOVE this place. I would give up my first 'born' child for this place.
I am Rachel and I like this place, but not too too strongly.
I am not crazy about Toms diner, but I like their milkshakes and fries. Some say the milkshakes taste like chemicals, but i've only been twice.
I really like it here!  Its tiny and cute and you can see the whole thing in an hour and no one is ever there so it is nice and quiet
I used to love Calle Ocho, but they closed recently. Bodega 88 is run by the same management though! By the way this app is awesome!
